title: Beloved Jersey
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Riko-chan, Riko-chan! Maru needs your help zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>What’s up, Hamamaru-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru has PE today, but Maru forgot my jersey. Can Maru borrow yours?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Oh, is that it? Your face is so red, so I thought something bad happened~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It’s a big deal for me zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. I’ll help you out, Hanamaru-chan. Here, take this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you, Riko-chan! Maru can’t believe there would come a day where Maru would be so glad to have a jersey zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Come on, if you don’t go soon, you won’t have time to change.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ah! That’s right. Maru will return later to give this back, Riko-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You can do that after school. Do your best on PE, Hanamaru-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
